Detailed Description

This modules define API specific to LCD controller.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_BSP_LCDCTRL_CONTROL_BRIGHTNESS
Value:
(BSP_LCD_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE + \
0x05U)
BSP_LCD_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE
#define BSP_LCD_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE
IOCTL base address for the Lcd Controller driver IOCTLs.
Definition: bsp_device.h:231

control brightness.

This IOCTL can be used to control the brightness of the LCD. Input to this API is pointer to the brightness value. Value is in percentage(only 0 to 100 is valid)

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] UInt32 *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.

#define IOCTL_BSP_LCDCTRL_SELECT_MODE_DE_OR_SYNC
Value:
(BSP_LCD_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE + \
0x06U)
BSP_LCD_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE
#define BSP_LCD_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE
IOCTL base address for the Lcd Controller driver IOCTLs.
Definition: bsp_device.h:231

select the mode.

This IOCTL can be used to select the mode. For supported values Bsp_LcdCtrlSyncMode. cmdArgs is pointer to an integer(valid values Bsp_LcdCtrlSyncMode).

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] UInt32 *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else failure.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Bsp_LcdCtrlSyncMode

Enum for sensor ID for image sensors exposure time.

Enumerator
BSP_LCD_CTRL_MODE_DE 

Data Enable mode of operation.

BSP_LCD_CTRL_MODE_HSYNC_VSYNC 

Hsync Vsync mode of operation.

BSP_LCD_CTRL_MODE_MAX 

Max mode.
